status.label: Status
status.help_text: Lead status. Lead statuses must be setup in your Organization Settings first before they will show up in this drop-down.

contact_url.label: Contact URL
contact_url.help_text: The URL for the contact to be associated with this Lead.

address_street_1.label: Address Street 1
address_street_1.help_text: First part of the street address for an address (e.g., "501 Forest Ave")

address_street_2.label: Address Street 2
address_street_2.help_text: Second part of a street address if necessary (e.g., "Suite 410")

address_city.label: Address City
address_city.help_text: City name for an address (e.g., "Palo Alto")

address_state.label: Address State
address_state.help_text: State (abbreviation, if in the U.S.). E.g., "CA"

address_country.label: Address Country
address_country.help_text: Country abbreviation for an address. E.g., "US"

note.label: Note
note.help_text: Add a note to this contact when you add it.

status_id.label: Status
status_id.help_text: Lead status. Lead statuses must be setup in your Organization Settings first before they will show up in this drop-down.

user_id.label: User
user_id.help_text: Select the user to associate to this opportunity.  Defaults to your user account.

value_period.label: Value Period
value_period.help_text: Return only one time, monthly, or annual opportunities.

lead_id.label: Lead
lead_id.help_text: Select the lead to assign this opportunity to. If you have access to the lead ID, use the advanced features at the bottom of the drop-down to input the ID one time, or dynamically via trigger variable.

note.label: Note
note.help_text: Add a note to this opportunity when you add it.

confidence.label: Confidence
confidence.help_text: Set a percentage confidence level in this opportunity (between 0 and 100).

value.label: Value
value.help_text: Set a value for this opportunity in dollars (i.e. 1000 or 49.99).

user_id.label: Assigned To
user_id.help_text: Select the user to assign this task to.  Defaults to your user account.

lead_id.label: Lead
lead_id.help_text: Select the lead to assign this opportunity to. If you have access to the lead ID, use the advanced features at the bottom of the drop-down to input the ID one time, or dynamically via trigger variable.

due_date.label: Due Date
due_date.help_text: Set a due date for this task.

is_complete.label: Is Complete
is_complete.help_text: Set whether this task is complete.

lead_id.label: Lead
lead_id.help_text: Select the lead to assign this note to. If you have access to the lead ID, use the advanced features at the bottom of the drop-down to input the ID one time, or dynamically via trigger variable.

lead_id.label: Lead
lead_id.help_text: Select the lead to assign this call to. If you have access to the lead ID, use the advanced features at the bottom of the drop-down to input the ID one time, or dynamically via trigger variable.

contact_id.label: Contact ID
contact_id.help_text: Select the contact to assign this call to. If you have access to the contact ID, use the advanced features at the bottom of the drop-down to input the ID one time, or dynamically via trigger variable.

phone.label: Phone Number
phone.help_text: The phone number called for this call.

direction.label: Direction
direction.help_text: Select whether the call was inbound or outbound.

duration.label: Duration
duration.help_text: The duration of the call in seconds.

recording_url.label: Recording URL
recording_url.help_text: An URL pointing to the MP3 recording of your call. For security reasons, we require the URL to be secure (i.e. starting with https://)

lead_id.label: Lead
lead_id.help_text: Select the lead to assign this call to. If you have access to the lead ID, use the advanced features at the bottom of the drop-down to input the ID one time, or dynamically via trigger variable.

new_lead_v2.label: New Lead
new_lead_v2.help_text: Creates a new lead (with line items support).

status.help_text: Lead status. Lead statuses must be setup in your Organization Settings first before they will show up in this drop-down.

contact_url.label: Contact URL
contact_url.help_text: The URL for the contact to be associated with this Lead.

address_state.help_text: State (abbreviation, if in the U.S.). E.g., "CA"

address_country.label: Address Country
address_country.help_text: Country abbreviation for an address. E.g., "US"

note.label: Text
note.help_text: Add a note to this contact when you add it.

opportunity_confidence.label: Opportunity confidence
opportunity_confidence.help_text: Set a percentage confidence level in this opportunity (between 0 and 100).

opportunity_value.label: Opportunity Value
